argument.name: dbfname
argument.description: (optional) DBF Table to load, or '<clear>', default is system speed_glossary table

page.description: Loads the speed glossary from disk into memory. If no value is specified for dbfname then the global, system glossary is loaded. If dbfname is specified, then the glossary is loaded from the specified table. If dbfname is '<clear>' the speed glossary is cleared from memory.
page.discussion: Loads the speed glossary from disk into memory. If no value is specified for dbfname then the global, system glossary is loaded. If dbfname is specified, then the glossary is loaded from the specified table. If dbfname is '<clear>' the speed glossary is cleared from memory.
